content: That is terrifying and fascinating. We have the resources to “turn off” what it means to be human and let our minds fade. It almost sounds peaceful, to release our pains and stresses while falling into nothing and everything. But we don’t just leave the pain, we leave our first kiss, our childhood memories, our commitments. I hope to never experience that hollow emptyness, although if it happened I guess I wouldn’t care. Spooky!
